description:
Lightning-smart PHP IDE

PhpStorm is a development tool for PHP and Web projects. Itâ€™s a perfect PHP IDE for working with Laravel, Symfony, Drupal, WordPress, and other frameworks.
PhpStorm 2024.3 is now available!
The highlights of this major update include:

- PHP 8.4 support [WI-78717]
- AI Assistant improvements
- xdebug_notify() support [WI-63456]
- Laravel Herd's PHP interpreter [WI-74361]
Explore the full list of the new features on our What's New page
The full list of changes in PhpStorm 2024.3 is available in the release notes.

- Download PhpStorm

- Report bugs to our issue tracker
